Name: Kyoto Colorful Days
About the game: 'Kyoto Colorful Days' is a Visual Novel, set in the sightseeing hotspot of Kyoto. This visual novel is populated by various different characters and the story can be enjoyed like a TV drama. The story centers around the protagonist, a young man who is drifting by aimlessly in life, unable to commit to a job. With no particular goal in sight, he visits Kyoto, a city to which his grandfather has connections. In his meetings with the local people there, and two girls in particular, he will discover his own path in life. - Romance visual novel - Opening&Ending song with Japanese vocals - Fully voiced in Japanese ã€€Most characters other than the protagonist (the player) will talk in the local Kyoto dialect to really bring the atmosphere of the area to life. -Including a mode where players can learn greetings and phrases in both standard Japanese and the Kyoto dialect. --SNS------------------- / --HP------------------- -lab.com/
